name: Manic Miner 2010
overview: In this unauthorized conversion of the 1983 Spectrum version done by Stefan Wessels that was at the time authored by Matthew Smith you play the role of Miner Willy, a bold explorer and adventurer. He discovers a network of underground caverns used by an advanced but now extinct civilization, and realizes that the mines contain lucrative metal ores. Through 20 caverns, you must collect all treasures before all time (air) runs out, watching out for the nasty guardians, the obstacles, dead falls, quicksands and all elements to be found in a classic platform game
